theClanless:AaronsFeedingRazorRelic.NAME: Aaron's Feeding Razor
theClanless:AaronsFeedingRazorRelic.FLAVOR: Take care how you cut yourself. It is more dangerous than you think...
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 10 attacks you play heal you for 20% of the damage dealt, minimum 2.

theClanless:DrumOfXipeTopecRelic.NAME: Drum of Xipe Topec
theClanless:DrumOfXipeTopecRelic.FLAVOR: I don't know who Xipe was, but he had rhythm!

theClanless:HandOfConradRelic.NAME: Hand of Conrad
theClanless:HandOfConradRelic.FLAVOR: Are you mad enough to cut off your arm and replace it?

theClanless:ProtractedInvestmentRelic.NAME: Protracted Investment
theClanless:ProtractedInvestmentRelic.FLAVOR: Hold until you die, and continue holding.
DESCRIPTIONS: Invests all of your gold. Each time you defeat an elite or boss, collect 40 percent, up to 5 times!
